title: Strategies for Preventing Academic Dishonesty and Enhancing Learning Effectiveness in Online University Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of online learning and elementary-level social science knowledge
context.additional_context: Environment emphasizing project execution and collaboration using digital devices, designed for current industry practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three types of academic dishonesty that may occur in online learning environments.
Learners can interpret correlation analysis results between academic dishonesty and learning elements using survey data.
Learners can propose at least two strategies to reduce academic dishonesty through improvements in course design and operational quality.
Learners can analyze the relationship between learning engagement, satisfaction, interest, and academic dishonesty and apply findings to educational improvement plans.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
